item.title: Beyond the Cloud: ESXi to Hyper-V in 30 Days - Part VII
item.description: Coming Soon This blog post is part of the “Beyond the Cloud: The Case for On-Premises Virtualization” series and will cover: 30-Day Migration Timeline: Week-by-week project plan and milestones Pre-Migration Assessment: Inventory scripts and compatibility checking Storage Migration Strategies: Cut-over approaches and data protection VM Conversion Process: P2V and V2V migration techniques Network Configuration: VLAN and switch configuration migration Testing and Validation: Performance benchmarking and functionality testing User Impact Mitigation: Communication strategies and rollback procedures Automation Scripts: PowerShell and other tools for streamlined migration Series Navigation Introduction: Beyond the Cloud: Rethinking Virtualization Post-VMware Part I: Beyond the Cloud: CapEx vs Subscription TCO Analysis Part II: Beyond the Cloud: 2025 Virtualization Licensing Guide Part III: Beyond the Cloud: Hardware Considerations Part IV: Beyond the Cloud: Feature Face-Off Part V: Beyond the Cloud: Arc Enable Everything Part VI: Beyond the Cloud: Disconnected & Rugged Part VII: ESXi to Hyper-V in 30 Days - A Pilot Migration Playbook (This Post - Coming Soon) This post is currently in development.
